control.visible: Skin.HasSetting(themes) + String.Contains(Skin.String(themedir), Crash Bandicoot) | String.Contains(Skin.String(themedir), WW2) | String.Contains(Skin.String(themedir), Battlefield) | String.Contains(Skin.String(themedir), The River)
Skin.String(color.background) + Skin.HasSetting(BackgroundCustomColour) + String.Contains(Skin.String(themedir), Flow) | String.Contains(Skin.String(themedir), Dual) + Skin.HasSetting(themes)
